description.value: ValueSet IMMZD2DTJELiveAttenuatedVaccine for IMMZ.D2.DT.JE.Live attenuated vaccine. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a Japanese encephalitis (JE) vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: Live attenuated vaccination schedule (1-dose scheme) JE vaccination should be integrated into national immunization schedules in all areas where JE is recognized as a public health priority
